channel.title: Anyone here play Super Smash Bros. Melee?
channel.description: I LOVE that game. I constantly play it. Anyway, I just set up a regular melee, 4 cpu's set at level 9, and stock of 25 lives. I got 52 KO'S with 2 lives left. I have some statistics of a good 99 stock game somewhere...

item.title: Anyone here play Super Smash Bros. Melee?

Well, E3 is from the 10th to 12th.

item.title: Anyone here play Super Smash Bros. Melee?
item.dc:creator: @ShadowZ ShadowZ
item.description:
@ShadowZ wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:6, topic:2508”]I just play melee.

I will cry in joy if it ever comes out multiplayer for the revolutin(or whatever they changed the name for). I dont play much anymore, its getting old.[/quote]

Nintendo Wii
Pronnounced as We
Also pronnounced as Wee
Wich is Piss - And what did we learned today? - I suck at english xD

Cant wait for the new SSB though, think its gonna own

item.title: Anyone here play Super Smash Bros. Melee?

item.description:
@jme wrote:

I beat everything there is in that game. Every trophy, every character, every level with every character, every event match, etc…

Great for keeping friends entertained My friends are super un-nerds(not nerds at all) and I figure if they like it then it must be good
